;受邀出席就职典礼的嘉宾10月2日，雅加达至万隆高铁的乘客在印度尼西亚雅加达哈利姆站自拍。这条高铁是“一带一路”项目的一部分，将两座城市之间的旅行时间从三座城市缩短至四十五分钟。

;

; 中国周二公布的关于“一带一路”倡议十年的综合性政策文件中令人印象深刻的事实和数据令人信服地说明了国家和地区所取得的巨大而切实的成果。专家表示，并强调了这一里程碑式愿景进一步发展的潜力。

;

; 他们是在国务院新闻办公室在北京举行新闻发布会发布题为《 “一带一路：构建人类命运共同体的重要支柱”。

;

; 2013年9月和10月，习近平主席提出共建丝绸之路经济带和丝绸之路经济带的倡议21世纪海上丝绸之路，即后来的“一带一路”倡议。

;

; 过去十年，“一带一路”倡议“帮助解决全球发展挑战，完善全球治理体系”，“推动了全球治理体系的发展”。白皮书称，“一带一路”倡议是“一条向所有人开放的公路，不是任何一方独占的私路”。 ”，文件称这一愿景“不受地缘政治考量”。

;

;“欢迎欧亚大陆、非洲、美洲和大洋洲的国家参与该倡议，无论其政治制度如何、历史背景、文化、发展阶段、意识形态、宗教信仰，只要谋求共同发展，”

;

; 国家发展和改革委员会副主任丛亮指出，2013-22年中国与“一带一路”沿线国家进出口总额达到19.1万亿美元，年均增长率达6.4%。

;

;在谈到“一带一路”总体进展时，他表示，目前已有150多个国家和30多个国际组织加入“一带一路”大家庭。

;

; 过去十年，各国共建“一带一路”“全面实现了从理念到行动、从愿景到现实的转变”。

;

; 商务部副部长郭婷婷指出， 2013年至2022年，中国与“一带一路”沿线国家投资总额超过3800亿美元，其中中国对外直接投资超过2400亿美元。

;

; 这些国家“也积极投资”过去十年来，中国对华投资累计超过1400亿美元，在华新设企业近6.7万家。”王女士说。

;

;中国人民大学国际关系学院教授、国际问题研究所所长易伟表示，过去10年，“一带一路”找到了拉动经济增长的关键，它催化了基础设施建设

;

;“推进脱贫攻坚、缩小贫富差距、促进有效全球治理是‘一带一路’聚焦的三大效应”关于基础设施和连通性，”

;

; 中国社会科学院国际政治经济研究所所长徐秀军强调，“一带一路”框架下取得的丰硕成果。世界经济与政治研究所表示，“一带一路”倡议“把为‘一带一路’沿线国家人民带来实实在在的利益作为主要目标之一，他们的获得感确实不断增强，自我认同感日益增强。” ”。

;

; 他指出，愿景已经进入高质量发展阶段，要努力推动软硬件互联互通更加协调发展。

;

; 北京正在第三届“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛将于本月晚些时候举办，此次活动将为广泛期待的双边和多边外交提供场所。

;

; 来自 130 多个国家和超过 100 个国家的代表外交部国际经济司司长李克新告诉记者，已有30个国际组织确认参加论坛。 2017年和2019年，中国已举办过有关“一带一路”的重大聚会。

;

; 即将举行的论坛“不仅是纪念“一带一路”十周年的最盛大活动，也是共商“一带一路”的重要平台李克强表示，论坛具体日程将适时发布。

;

; 中方愿以此次论坛为契机，推动高质量合作取得新成果。 ——建设“一带一路”。

;

; 专家表示，随着未来几个月中国经济基本面持续向好，政府支持性政策为经济增长提供更多动力，A股市场将在第四季度进一步复苏.

;

; 商业活动和消费领域明显的经济稳定增长迹象将为A股市场的好转奠定基础，低估值已使其成为有吸引力的投资前景他们表示。

;

; 中国政府今年早些时候推出的振兴资本市场的支持性政策，加上利率飙升可能结束而导致全球流动性宽松的前景，将迎来更多资本流入A股市场，提振投资者信心他们补充说，信心。

;

; 投资银行高盛亚太区首席策略师蒂莫西·莫(Timothy Moe)周二表示，中国基本面的连续改善、目前A股估值较低以及

;

; 在周日发布的投资组合策略研究报告中，高盛专家表示，他们对 A 股持有增持策略，感谢第四季度典型的季节性利好因素将在今年剩余时间内支撑中国股市。中信建投证券分析师预计消费领域将进一步复苏。以近期中秋、国庆假期期间录得的健康零售和出行数据为证。 9月份汽车销量的复苏也应该被视为消费数据改善的迹象。他们表示，10月份这一势头可能会持续。

;

; 安信证券分析师表示，A股市场无论是业绩还是投资者情绪都已经触底。科技公司和小盘公司可能会引领反弹，因为之前的政策有利于它们的长期发展。

;

; 中国中小企业发展指数环比攀升0.2点第三季度达到89.2，回到扩张区间，并达到两年来的最高水平。指数编制者中国中小企业协会秘书长谢吉表示，这一增幅表明今年早些时候推出的经济刺激计划正在显现积极效果。

;

; 张启尧兴业证券策略师表示，外资机构“中国经济增长的积极前景将缓解A股市场资本流出的压力，甚至导致未来几个月资本流入。

;

; 美国Vanguard投资集团专家基于前几个月好于预期的贸易、通胀和信贷需求数据，一致认为中国经济增长有企稳迹象。因此，他们维持对2023年中国GDP增速在5.25%至5.75%之间的预测。

;

; 9月下旬，摩根大通将中国2023年GDP增​​速预测上调至5%，高于此前预期的4.8%。

;

; 招商证券首席策略师张霞表示，美国国债收益率近期可能会开启下行周期。鉴于四季度人民币币值周期性上涨，未来几个月A股市场流动性将有所改善，外资流入或将加速。

;

; 但也存在挑战有待解决。百达资产管理公司(Pictet Asset Management)首席策略师卢卡·保里尼(Luca Paolini)在周二发布的一份报告中写道，房地产行业的复苏是“一块缺失的拼图”。这可能会提振消费者信心。

;

; 同样，国际货币基金组织周二将中国 2023 年经济增长预测从 5.2% 下调至 5.0%，原因是房地产行业存在抑制经济活动并拖累经济的风险。

;

; 国际货币基金组织下调了除美国以外的所有主要经济体 2023 年的预测。

;以色列消防员与周一，以色列南部阿什凯隆的一处地点发生火灾，该地点被哈马斯从加沙地带发射的火箭击中。

;

; 世界各地要求停火和减少平民痛苦的呼声越来越高。以巴冲突进入第四天。

;

; 据以色列军方和巴勒斯坦当局称，截至周二，已有近 1,800 名以色列人和巴勒斯坦人以及多名外国人在冲突中死亡。

;

;在北京，外交部发言人汪文斌表示，中方正在努力核实和确认有关中方在冲突中伤亡的报道。他是针对两名中国工人在加沙边境附近被杀的报道发表上述言论的。

; 中国呼吁该国外交使团全力搜寻失踪的中国公民并救治受伤人员。王在周二的例行新闻发布会上说道。

;

;

; 翟在与埃及外交部巴勒斯坦司助理部长奥萨马·赫德尔通电话时表示，中方愿与埃及保持沟通协调，推动结束这一事件。

; 中方愿与开罗一道，推动国际社会共同向巴勒斯坦人民提供人道主义支持，防止巴勒斯坦特别是加沙地区人道主义危机加剧

;

; 赫德尔赞赏中方在巴勒斯坦问题上的公正立场，表示埃及期待与中方共同努力，为缓和局势作出努力。

;

;阿拉伯联盟和俄罗斯联邦也呼吁进行谈判并结束“敌对行动”。以色列和巴勒斯坦之间的冲突。

;

; 哈马斯高级官员穆萨·阿布·马尔祖克在电话采访中告诉半岛电视台，该组织对“所有政治对话”持开放态度。当被问及是否可能与以色列停战时，俄罗斯通讯社塔斯社和路透社周二报道。

;

; 然而，哈马斯的立场是：新华社援引军事部门发言人阿布·奥贝达的话说，他在一份音频声明中警告称，任何针对巴勒斯坦人民及其家园的行为都将导致以色列平民人质被处决。

;

; 以色列表示，哈马斯据美联社报道，加沙的其他武装组织将 150 多名士兵和平民扣为人质。

;

; 以色列国防部长约阿夫·加兰特 (Yoav Gallant) 周一下令对以色列进行“全面围困”，停火呼吁进一步升温。一天前，以色列总理本杰明·内塔尼亚胡向哈马斯宣战，并发誓要进行“强有力的复仇”。这可能“改变中东”。

; 巴勒斯坦总统马哈茂德·阿巴斯在与联合国秘书长安东尼奥·古特雷斯通电话时强调，向加沙居民提供救济和医疗援助以防止据巴勒斯坦通讯社报道，古特雷斯表示，联合国正在努力向加沙居民提供紧急人道主义救援。

;1963年，王进喜（左）与劳模在黑龙江大庆油田合影.

; ;

;早期照片该油田展示在大庆铁人王进喜纪念馆。

; ;

;

; ;

;光伏大庆油田发电厂为现场提供太阳能发电。

; ;

;游客在大庆纪念馆了解过去。

; ;

;大庆油田一景。

;

; 一个月来，黑龙江省大庆市铁人王进喜纪念馆迎来了他诞辰100周年，吸引了众多游客。

;

; 参观者们聆听了王进喜的工作介绍，并向纪念他的雕像献花。

;

;

; 在进入47米高的纪念馆之前，他们爬了47级台阶，象征着王先生相对短暂但不平凡的47年一生，他被同事和当地居民昵称为“铁人”，意为“铁”

;

; 1923年10月8日，王先生出生于甘肃省玉门县的一个贫困农村家庭，童年经历了一段苦难的岁月，但他的童年却变得坚强、坚强。

; < 1950年春，他通过考试，成为新中国成立后第一代石油钻井工人。

;

; 1956年4月29日1959年，王因在玉门的工作表现，被授予全国劳动模范奖章，并应邀出席在北京举行的建党十周年颁奖典礼。中华人民共和国成立。

;

; 在首都之行中，他惊讶地发现每辆公交车的车顶上都放着一个巨大的袋子。

;

; 当得知公交车因汽油短缺而烧煤气时，他说他感觉自己的心脏被刺穿了。

;

; 王回到玉门后告诉工友：“毒气袋提醒我我们国家面临的压力。没有原油，我们就无法发展这个工业，所以作为石油工人，我们需要承担起为国家石油工业做出贡献的责任。”

;

; 20世纪50年代，中国面临着巨大的经济困难。

;

; 1958年2月，政府批准石油勘探工作东移的指示，次年9月26日，第一批原油涌出在黑龙江一个鲜为人知的地区，石油从地下涌出。

;

; 新发现的油田被命名为大庆，意为“大庆”，以纪念即将到来的建国十周年。

;

; 4万多名退伍军人、技术专家和石油工人聚集在大庆开发油田，其中包括1960年3月率领一批来自甘肃的工人。

;

;下车休息后，王和同事们在大庆火车站开始卸设备。

;

; 然而，在运输大件设备时，他们遇到了重重困难，其中包括一台重达60多台的钻机。公吨。

;

; 新成立的城市没有大型卡车可以帮助工人们完成任务。

;

; 他们拆除了钻机，花了三天时间将零件装到卡车上。

;

; 为了尽快开工，王先生带领团队从1公里外的一个小水池取水。团队利用水桶、脸盆等各种物品，用了约24小时，将50多吨水运至油井。

;

; 接下来的几年，王带领1205钻井队创下了一系列的记录。 1960年4月，王某因钻管而右腿受伤，但在没有医生的情况下离开了医院。 ;

;

; 他的同事和当地居民被他战胜极度疲劳、挑战自我极限的热情所感动，给他起了个绰号“铁人”。

;

; 只有三个大庆油田建成几年后，石油产能就达到了500万吨/年，保证了我国燃料基本自给。

;

; 然而，长年累月的辛苦工作让王&# 39岁身体健康，1970年因胃癌去世。

;

;几十年来，油田和油田工人与一系列困难作斗争，他们的工作被奉为“铁人精神”，标志着中国工业发展的伟大变革。

;

; 3月份，该油田实现了建厂以来原油产量25亿吨的重大里程碑，占全国的36%。 #39;陆上原油总产量。

;

; 大庆油田公司执行董事朱国文表示：“这是中国工业史上和民族工业史上的一个重要里程碑。”确保能源安全的努力”补充说，迄今为止，中国最大的陆上油田已缴纳超过 3 万亿元人民币（4107 亿美元）的税费和其他费用。

;

; 该公司表示，该油田生产了 3000 万吨原油。去年天然气产量55.4亿立方米，天然气产量连续12年增长。

;

; 大庆油田公司创新开发了世界领先的陆上砂岩油田开发技术，引领世界高质量发展走在全国同行前列。

;

; 1976年至2002年，该油田年产原油超过5000万吨，被许多观察家誉为世界奇迹。

;

; 2003年以来，尽管储量不断减少——老油田的一个常见问题——大庆借助新技术，加强现场管理，提高生产控制。

;

; ;辛苦了;

;

; 大庆年度三次采油21年来，公司产量突破1000万吨，目前总产量已达3亿吨，成为全球最大的三次采油研究中心和全球最大的三次采油技术应用基地。

;

; 公司表示，已取得技术创新和发明11000余项，其中国家级科学技术奖120余项、国家自然科学奖一等奖1项、特等奖3项。

;

;为全面提升生产力，更好地参与“一带一路”建设，公司参与了海外油气田、管道、电站等众多能源项目。石油勘探队先后出访委内瑞拉、埃及、苏丹等50多个国家和地区。

;

; 9月21日，中国石油天然气集团公司所属大庆油田公司8名职工荣获铁人精神新典范在大庆纪念王进喜诞辰一百周年上的讲话。

;

; 朱总说：“王进喜是大庆人民的杰出代表，是全油田的榜样”中国的工人。尽管他已离开我们半个多世纪，但他的“铁人精神”依然存在。继续照耀着我们。”

;

; 八名劳模之一、公司第二采油厂班组长刘莉说：“和王进喜一样，我的父亲也是是 20 世纪 60 年代初开发油田的第一代人的一部分。我是听着他们关于油田的故事和大家的辛勤劳动长大的。我决心遵循“铁人精神” ”

;

; 自 1993 年加入该厂以来，这位勤奋的 49 岁老人把大部分业余时间都花在加深采油知识和接受专业培训上。

;

; 1994年，她在工厂举办的技术竞赛中获得第二名，三年后，刘在全国技术竞赛中获得第三名。当时年仅23岁的她是最年轻的获奖者。

;

; 2001年，经过几个月的研究和测试，刘发明了一种新工具——撬棍、管钳、扳手和螺丝刀的组合。这是她在创新之路上迈出的第一步，这项发明鼓励她继续工作。

;

;“工人们过去携带一套重量超过10公斤的单独工具，但组合起来工具仅重 2.5 公斤，这让他们的生活变得更加轻松。”

;

; 刘和她的团队的其他成员拥有2000多项技术创新和发明，解决了一系列与生产相关的问题。

;

; 她还凭借其敬业精神、敬业精神和技术创新荣获多项奖项。

;

; “作为新一代石油工作者，我们将大力推进油气勘探开发，以实际行动保障国家能源安全，把我国建设成为社会主义现代化国家”刘说。

;

;多年来，音乐和许多纪录片等电影都描绘了王的生活。

;

;2021年7月，中国辽宁芭蕾舞团创作了舞剧《钢铁侠》，该剧将芭蕾舞与中国古典舞、现代舞相结合，讲述王的故事。

;

; 该剧已由中国辽宁芭蕾舞团和辽宁省歌舞团的百余位艺术家在全国多个城市演出

;

; 中国辽宁芭蕾舞团团长瞿子娇表示：“我们希望让公众更好地了解‘铁人精神’”。 ”

;

; 5月份在大庆演出《钢铁侠》后，一位观众表示：“这是我第一次看芭蕾舞剧，但是钢铁侠是我心目中最好的。和大多数大庆年轻人一样，我为能投身于油田而感到自豪。”

; Wed, 11 Oct 2023 05:52:05 +0800 002PAGE TWO - IRON MAN'S SPIRIT LIVES ON AT OILFIELDhttps://mobile.chinadaily.com.cn/cn/html5/2023-10/11/content_002_6525c285ed50d203d2ca0387.htm#002PAGE TWO
;
;; ;

;1963年，王进喜（左）与劳模在黑龙江大庆油田合影.

; ;

;早期照片该油田展示在大庆铁人王进喜纪念馆。

; ;

;

; ;

;光伏大庆油田发电厂为现场提供太阳能发电。

; ;

;游客在大庆纪念馆了解过去。

; ;

;大庆油田一景。

;

; 一个月来，黑龙江省大庆市铁人王进喜纪念馆迎来了他诞辰100周年，吸引了众多游客。

;

; 参观者们聆听了王进喜的工作介绍，并向纪念他的雕像献花。

;

;

; 在进入47米高的纪念馆之前，他们爬了47级台阶，象征着王先生相对短暂但不平凡的47年一生，他被同事和当地居民昵称为“铁人”，意为“铁”

;

; 1923年10月8日，王先生出生于甘肃省玉门县的一个贫困农村家庭，童年经历了一段苦难的岁月，但他的童年却变得坚强、坚强。

; < 1950年春，他通过考试，成为新中国成立后第一代石油钻井工人。

;

; 1956年4月29日1959年，王因在玉门的工作表现，被授予全国劳动模范奖章，并应邀出席在北京举行的建党十周年颁奖典礼。中华人民共和国成立。

;

; 在首都之行中，他惊讶地发现每辆公交车的车顶上都放着一个巨大的袋子。

;

; 当得知公交车因汽油短缺而烧煤气时，他说他感觉自己的心脏被刺穿了。

;

; 王回到玉门后告诉工友：“毒气袋提醒我我们国家面临的压力。没有原油，我们就无法发展这个工业，所以作为石油工人，我们需要承担起为国家石油工业做出贡献的责任。”

;

; 20世纪50年代，中国面临着巨大的经济困难。

;

; 1958年2月，政府批准石油勘探工作东移的指示，次年9月26日，第一批原油涌出在黑龙江一个鲜为人知的地区，石油从地下涌出。

;

; 新发现的油田被命名为大庆，意为“大庆”，以纪念即将到来的建国十周年。

;

; 4万多名退伍军人、技术专家和石油工人聚集在大庆开发油田，其中包括1960年3月率领一批来自甘肃的工人。

;

;下车休息后，王和同事们在大庆火车站开始卸设备。

;

; 然而，在运输大件设备时，他们遇到了重重困难，其中包括一台重达60多台的钻机。公吨。

;

; 新成立的城市没有大型卡车可以帮助工人们完成任务。

;

; 他们拆除了钻机，花了三天时间将零件装到卡车上。

;

; 为了尽快开工，王先生带领团队从1公里外的一个小水池取水。团队利用水桶、脸盆等各种物品，用了约24小时，将50多吨水运至油井。

;

; 接下来的几年，王带领1205钻井队创下了一系列的记录。 1960年4月，王某因钻管而右腿受伤，但在没有医生的情况下离开了医院。 ;

;

; 他的同事和当地居民被他战胜极度疲劳、挑战自我极限的热情所感动，给他起了个绰号“铁人”。

;

; 只有三个大庆油田建成几年后，石油产能就达到了500万吨/年，保证了我国燃料基本自给。

;

; 然而，长年累月的辛苦工作让王&# 39岁身体健康，1970年因胃癌去世。

;

;几十年来，油田和油田工人与一系列困难作斗争，他们的工作被奉为“铁人精神”，标志着中国工业发展的伟大变革。

;

; 3月份，该油田实现了建厂以来原油产量25亿吨的重大里程碑，占全国的36%。 #39;陆上原油总产量。

;

; 大庆油田公司执行董事朱国文表示：“这是中国工业史上和民族工业史上的一个重要里程碑。”确保能源安全的努力”补充说，迄今为止，中国最大的陆上油田已缴纳超过 3 万亿元人民币（4107 亿美元）的税费和其他费用。

;

; 该公司表示，该油田生产了 3000 万吨原油。 and 5.54 billion cubic meters of natural gas last year, with its gas production rising for the 12th consecutive year.

;

; Daqing Oilfield Co has innovated and developed world-leading technologies for the development of onshore sandstone oilfields, leading the nation among its peers in terms of high-quality development.

;

; The oilfield, which had an annual crude output of more than 50 million tons from 1976 to 2002, has been hailed by many observers as a miracle in the history of oilfield development.

;

; Since 2003, despite shrinking reserves — a common problem among older oilfields — Daqing has strengthened on-site management and improved production control with the help of new technology.

;

; ;Laborious work;

;

; Daqing's annual tertiary oil recovery exceeded 10 million tons over the past 21 years, with the company boasting a total production of 300 million tons to date, making it the largest center globally for research in tertiary oil recovery and the largest site in the world using such technology.

;

; The company said it has achieved more than 11,000 technical innovations and inventions, including over 120 national-level science and technology awards, one first prize and three grand prizes in the National Natural Science Award.

;

; To boost productivity in an all-around way and better take part in the Belt and Road Initiative, the company has been involved with numerous energy projects overseas, including oil and gas fields, pipelines and power stations. Its oil exploration teams have visited more than 50 countries and regions, including Venezuela, Egypt and Sudan.

;

; On Sept 21, eight workers from Daqing Oilfield Co, a subsidiary of China National Petroleum Corp, were awarded the title New Model of Tieren Spirit at a commemoration in Daqing to mark the centenary of Wang Jinxi's birth.

;

; Zhu said: "Wang was an outstanding representative of the Daqing people and a model for all oilfield workers in China. Although he left us for more than half a century ago, his 'Tieren spirit' continues to shine on us."

;

; Liu Li, one of the eight model workers and team head at the company's second oil extraction plant, said: "Like Wang Jinxi, my father was part of the first generation to develop the oilfield at the beginning of the 1960s. I grew up listening to their stories about the oilfield and the hard work everyone put in. I was determined to follow the 'Tieren spirit' at a young age."

;

; Since joining the plant in 1993, the industrious 49-year-old has spent much of her spare time deepening her knowledge of oil extraction and undergoing professional training.

;

; In 1994, she finished in second place in a technology competition held at her plant, and three years later, Liu took third place in a national technology competition. Just 23 at the time, she was the youngest of the winners.

;

; In 2001, after months of research and testing, Liu invented a new tool — a combination of a crowbar, pipe pliers, a wrench and a screwdriver. It was her first step on the road to innovation, and the invention encouraged her to continue her work.

;

; "Workers used to carry a set of individual tools that could weigh more than 10 kilograms, but the combination tool only weighs 2.5 kg, which makes their lives much easier," Liu said.

;

; With more than 2,000 technical innovations and inventions under their belts, Liu and the other members of her team have solved a series of production-related problems.

;

; She has also received a number of awards for her work ethic, professionalism and technical innovation.

;

; "As a new generation of oil workers, we will boost oil and gas exploration and development, take concrete action to ensure national energy security, and build China into a modern socialist country," Liu said.

;

; Over the years, music and many documentaries and other films have depicted the life of Wang.

;

; In July 2021, Liaoning Ballet of China created the dance drama Iron Man, which incorporates ballet and Chinese classic and modern dance to tell Wang's story.

;

; The drama has been performed by some 100 artists from Liaoning Ballet of China and the Liaoning provincial song and dance troupe in cities nationwide.

;

; Qu Zijiao, head of Liaoning Ballet of China, said, "We want the public to better understand the 'Tieren spirit' through the form of a dance drama."

;

; After a performance of Iron Man in Daqing in May, a member of the audience said: "It was the first time I had watched a ballet drama, but Iron Man is the best to my mind. Like most young people in Daqing, I feel proud to devote myself to the oilfield."

; Wed, 11 Oct 2023 05:52:05 +0800 003TOP NEWS - Trade role key to China-Japan ties, says surveyhttps://mobile.chinadaily.com.cn/cn/html5/2023-10/11/content_003_6525c288ed50d203d2ca0388.htm#003TOP NEWS
;
;

; People in China and Japan have emphasized the need for stronger trade cooperation and grassroots exchanges between the two countries, as they see bilateral ties as critical to regional peace and development, according to the results of the 19th China-Japan Public Opinion Poll released on Tuesday.

;

; The survey, conducted by the China Foreign Languages Publishing Administration and Japanese think tank Genron NPO, found that about 60 percent of Chinese respondents and 65 percent of Japanese respondents consider bilateral relations "important or comparatively important".

;

; Bilateral economic and trade cooperation has long been the cornerstone and driving force of Beijing-Tokyo ties, said the survey, adding that more than 54 percent of Chinese respondents and over 60 percent of their Japanese counterparts value each others' nation as a major global economic power and an important trade partner, reaffirming the crucial role of trade in China-Japan ties.

;

; The survey also highlighted the significant role of trade in the future growth of both countries, with 60.1 percent of Chinese respondents and over 67 percent of Japanese respondents recognizing the importance of trade cooperation.

;

; Furthermore, the survey emphasized the value of people-to-people exchanges in promoting China-Japan friendship, with 61.5 percent of Chinese respondents and 53.1 percent of those in Japan recognizing its significance.

;

; Both Chinese and Japanese people expressed high expectations from collaborations in addressing regional and global issues.

;

; The survey found that more than 65 percent of Chinese respondents and 62.4 percent of Japanese respondents consider peace as the most important goal to be achieved by the two nations, while 50.5 percent of Chinese respondents and 28 percent of their Japanese counterparts consider cooperative development a crucial shared objective.

;

; In addition, the survey revealed shared concerns over the discharge of nuclear-contaminated water from the Fukushima Daichi Nuclear Power Plant.

;

; Almost half of Chinese respondents and approximately 40 percent of their Japanese counterparts expressed worries about the issue. Only 25 percent of Japanese respondents had a positive attitude toward the credibility of the International Atomic Energy Agency's review results and the appropriateness of the discharge.

;

; This year marks the 45th anniversary of the signing of the Treaty of Peace and Friendship between China and Japan, and respondents from both countries have high expectations for the promotion of peaceful and friendly relations based on the spirit of the treaty.

;

; More than 43 percent of Chinese respondents believe that signing new political documents or adding supplementary files would enhance the treaty's effectiveness.

;

; The annual survey, which began in 2005, serves as an important platform for both countries to understand public opinion and foster mutual understanding.

;

; The State Council, China's Cabinet, said on Tuesday that efforts should be made to better monitor the situation of the country's low-income population in order to provide them with more targeted, timely and effective social assistance.

;

; According to an executive meeting of the State Council chaired by Premier Li Qiang, social assistance is a basic and fundamental arrangement of China's social security system.

;

; To better secure people's basic needs for livelihood, it is necessary to speed up efforts in shaping a pattern that can provide comprehensive social assistance to different groups of people at all levels in an efficient way, the meeting decided.

;

; Meeting participants urged governments at all levels to guarantee the basic living needs of people affected by disasters and other vulnerable groups, and distribute various types of benefits on time and in full, so that those in need can have safe and warm winter.

;

; The meeting noted that providing elderly people with catering services is an important livelihood project and a significant initiative supporting elderly care services in residential communities and improving the well-being of seniors.

;

; Efforts should be made to steadily develop catering services for the elderly according to local conditions and adopt measures to provide greater support for such services in rural areas, according to the meeting.

;

; Attendees at the meeting also discussed patent transformation and utilization, saying that fully tapping the value of patents and vigorously developing patent-intensive industries is a strategic task for promoting the country's high-quality development.

;

; They urged efforts to refine incentive policies, remove key barriers and cultivate a favorable market environment to facilitate patent transformation and utilization, thus accelerating the transformation of innovative results into productivity.

;

; The meeting adopted a guideline on providing better social assistance to the low-income population, an action plan on providing catering services to the elderly people, and an action plan on patent transformation and utilization.

; Wed, 11 Oct 2023 05:52:05 +0800 003TOP NEWS - Foreign Ministry urges US to conduct swift probe into San Francisco consulate car crashhttps://mobile.chinadaily.com.cn/cn/html5/2023-10/11/content_003_6525c291ed50d203d2ca038b.htm#003TOP NEWS
;
;; ;

;Emergency responders work outside the visa office of the Chinese consulate on Monday after a person drove into the building in San Francisco.

;

; China has strongly urged the United States to conduct a swift investigation and take effective measures to ensure the safety of Chinese diplomatic institutions and personnel after a vehicle crashed into the Chinese consulate-general building in San Francisco on Monday.

;

; Police fatally shot the driver of the blue Honda sedan that plowed through the consulate and into the lobby of the building's visa office in the afternoon. The identity of the driver, who died in a hospital, had not been released. There was no report of anyone else being injured in the incident.

;

; San Francisco police said they didn't know why the unidentified driver smashed through the front of the consulate, located on a major street across from the city's Japantown neighborhood. The San Francisco Standard, citing unnamed sources, said that police shot the driver believing that the person was armed.

;

; The Foreign Ministry said on Tuesday that an "unidentified individual" crashed into the consulate in San Francisco and tried to hurt visitors and consulate staff.

;

; "China strongly urges the US to launch a swift investigation and take effective measures to ensure the safety of Chinese diplomatic missions and personnel there," spokesman Wang Wenbin said at a regular news briefing.

;

; Wang also called on the US to take strong measures according to the Vienna Convention on Consular Relations.

;

; In a statement released on its WeChat account, the Chinese consulate said it would temporarily close its consular certificate hall starting on Tuesday, and would inform the public when services resume.

;

; A separate statement from the consulate denounced Monday's incident. "An unidentified person drove a vehicle and violently crashed into the visa office of our consulate, posing a serious threat to the safety of staff and people on site, and causing serious damage to our consulate's facilities," it said.

;

; The consulate said it severely condemns the violent attack and reserves the right to pursue responsibilities related to the incident. It said it has made solemn representations to the US, demanding that the truth be quickly ascertained and dealt with seriously in accordance with the law.

;

; "We also urge the United States to take all necessary measures to ensure the safety of Consulate General personnel and premises, in accordance with the relevant provisions of the Vienna Convention on Diplomatic Relations, the Vienna Convention on Consular Relations, and the Consular Convention between China and the US," the statement added.

;

; Agencies contributed to this story.

; Wed, 11 Oct 2023 05:52:05 +0800 003TOP NEWS - Domestic travel agencies suspend all tours to Israelhttps://mobile.chinadaily.com.cn/cn/html5/2023-10/11/content_003_6525c293ed50d203d2ca038c.htm#003TOP NEWS
;
;

; Travel agencies in China have stopped offering tours to Israel due to the escalating Israel-Palestine conflict, requesting that travelers think carefully before booking any trips to destinations considered risky.

;

; "We have no travelers stranded in Israel or in transit on their way back to the mainland. We've so far taken tour offers to Israel off the platform and are helping our customers to cancel their trips to the area," said Liu Haomiao, travel portal Tuniu's director of tourism market in Middle East and Africa.

;

; She said the platform has received requests from customers to cancel their trips to Israel and Jordan. Those customers were expected to depart around the middle of October and in November. "We've given full refunds to customers who were bound for these areas before Oct 25, following regulations and policies of respective airlines."

;

; LY.com, a travel portal, has suspended individual or group tours to Israel and is making full refunds to customers who were booked to travel to Israel in October and November. Springtour.com has canceled a group tour of 28 people traveling to Israel on Monday, saying it would organize tours to the country later allowing for China's policy and the situation in Israel.

;

; In August, China resumed group tours to 78 countries and regions and Israel was on the list.

;

; Wei Changren, founder of btiii.com, a tourism-related financial portal, said that Israel is not a traditionally popular travel destination for Chinese tourists. Travelers from other countries also avoid the area because of the sporadic conflicts there.

;

; "Israel is a technology hub and most people travel there for business. Jerusalem is attractive to pilgrims and people with religious beliefs, but it's not a popular choice for regular travelers," he said.

;

; Wei suggested that travelers should stay up to date with all possible information about their destinations, such as travel updates from Chinese embassies or consulates, before departing for any place considered unsafe. "If they encounter any trouble while traveling, they should seek help from embassies or consulates."

;

; The Ministry of Foreign Affairs said on Monday that it has activated consular protection and assistance for Chinese citizens and organizations in Israel and Palestine. The ministry asked Chinese people to suspend any travel plans to Israel and Palestine for the time being. Chinese people living in such areas have been asked to heighten self-protection measures and avoid outdoor activities.

; Wed, 11 Oct 2023 05:52:05 +0800 003TOP NEWS - A-share market set for further recoveryhttps://mobile.chinadaily.com.cn/cn/html5/2023-10/11/content_003_6525c293ed50d203d2ca038d.htm#003TOP NEWS
;
;

; The A-share market will recover further in the fourth quarter as China's economic fundamentals continue to improve over the following months and supportive government policies provide more impetus for economic growth, experts said.

;

; The signs of stable economic growth, evident in the areas of business activity and consumption, will form the foundation for a turnaround in the A-share market, where low valuations have already made it an attractive investment prospect, they said.

;

; Supportive policies that the Chinese government introduced earlier this year to invigorate the capital market, combined with the outlook of relaxed global liquidity as interest rate spikes likely come to an end, will usher in more capital flow to the A-share market and boost investors' confidence, they added.

;

; Timothy Moe, Asia-Pacific chief strategist at investment bank Goldman Sachs, said on Tuesday that the sequential improvement in China's fundamentals, low valuation of A shares at present and the typical seasonal tailwind in the fourth quarter will all support Chinese equities for the rest of the year.

;

; In a portfolio strategy research note released on Sunday, Goldman Sachs experts said they hold an overweight strategy for A shares, thanks to the alignment between supportive policies and China's growth objectives, including self-sufficiency, building an electric vehicle supply chain and mass market consumption.

;

; Analysts at China Securities expect a further recovery in the consumption sector, citing the healthy retail and travel data recorded during the recent Mid-Autumn Festival and National Day holidays as proof. The recovery in car sales in September should also be considered a sign of improving consumption data. The momentum is likely to be sustained in October, they said.

;

; Analysts from Essence Securities said the A-share market has already touched bottom in terms of both performance and investor sentiment. Technology companies and small-cap companies may lead the rebound, as previous policies have favored their long-term development.

;

; China's small and medium-sized enterprise development index climbed 0.2 point from a quarter earlier to 89.2 in the third quarter, returning to expansion territory and reaching its highest level in two years. Xie Ji, secretary-general of the China Association of Small and Medium Enterprises, the index compiler, said the increase has demonstrated that the economic stimulus packages introduced earlier this year are showing positive results.

;

; Zhang Qiyao, chief strategist at Industrial Securities, said that foreign institutions' positive outlook on China's economic growth will mitigate the pressure of capital outflow in the A-share market and even result in capital inflow in the following months.

;

; Experts from United States-based Vanguard Investment Group agreed that there are signs of economic growth stabilizing in China, based on the better-than-expected data in trade, inflation and credit demand in previous months. Therefore, they maintain their forecast that China's GDP growth will be between 5.25 and 5.75 percent in 2023.

;

; In late September, JP Morgan raised its forecast for China's 2023 GDP growth to 5 percent, up from its previous estimate of 4.8 percent.

;

; Zhang Xia, chief strategist at China Merchants Securities, said the US Treasury bond yield may start a downward cycle in the near future. Given the cyclical rise of the renminbi's value in the fourth quarter, the liquidity for the A-share market will improve and foreign capital inflow may accelerate in the following months.

;

; But there are also challenges to be addressed. Luca Paolini, chief strategist at Pictet Asset Management, wrote in a note released on Tuesday that a recovery in the property sector is "a missing piece of puzzle" that could bolster consumer confidence.

;

; Similarly, the International Monetary Fund lowered on Tuesday its 2023 economic growth forecast for China to 5.0 percent from 5.2 percent, due to the risks in the property sector stifling economic activity and weighing on household confidence.

;

; The IMF has lowered its 2023 forecasts for all the major economies except the US.
